channel.title: Requests
channel.description: Got a cool idea for a skin or model? Post it here, and maybe someone will create it for you!

item.title: Looking for Good Animal Skins/Models
item.author: invalid@example.com (=CD=PinkBunny69)
item.dc:creator: =CD=PinkBunny69
item.content:encoded:
Ok. Forget the post I did about StarTrek Models. Like I need to see StarTrek models in UT when I am getting StarTrek Online.

Anyways...

I Know the different animal skins out there and I love them all
But, I would like to see some of the Felina models and skins be male as well. So bascially, I am requesting for the person who makes the felina models and skins to make male ones. Like keeping the cat look but make it more male like....

Looking for Good Animal Skins/Models

item.title: Crazy Frog!
item.author: invalid@example.com (MeNIcE)
item.dc:creator: MeNIcE
item.content:encoded:
I can skin, I can map, but I can't model.....so I had the idea of having crazy frog in UT99....I have 2k3/4 but I find no enjoyment in playing them so I continue to play 99/GOTY. Here is a picture of crazy frog

Crazy Frog

I hope someone manages to make one =) Or if anyone has any models currently that look or are it then please post them because I really want one....

Also if someone has some crazy...

Crazy Frog!

item.title: Metroids!

item.dc:creator: Turret 49
item.content:encoded:
I've created a Metroid model in Maya (it's a mix of the old school metroids and the new 3d ones), and I'd like someone to skin it....

Metroids!

item.title: How about some StarTrek Models/skins
item.author: invalid@example.com (=CD=PinkBunny69)
item.dc:creator: =CD=PinkBunny69
item.content:encoded:
I am watching startrek lol so I thought of it. I dont need to show you what there look like, since we all know that...
Skins like: (for UT2004 mainly)
StarFleet Officers (Humans of couses and others)
Borg
Klingons
Gorn
etc.

Just a thought it up.
Plus imagine walking through a Borg ship on UT2004 lol that would freak me out. or a ship to ship fight. I found some ctf maps someone made using the Elite Force 1 and 2 maps.

item.title: Tutorial: Requests?
item.author: invalid@example.com (klasnic)
item.dc:creator: klasnic
item.content:encoded:
It just occured to me that if anyone wants other tutorials posted on the SkinCity boards, please let us know...

Something you're not sure about (like I can't find Upaint it's not on my disc (for the hundreth time))

More advanced skinning info/techniques...

Modelling topics...

Making nice portraits...

Upl entries, what they mean and what the variables are?

Let us know anyway and time willing they'll be added

item.title: BloodRayne.

item.content:encoded: ive been playing the new bloodrayne, awesome game. ive been thinkin we need a bloodrayne2 pack. some of the characters on that game would be so awesome in ut2k4. hmm jus wonder if sumone would do it.

item.title: Bloodrayne model or skin request
item.author: invalid@example.com (Alien Firefox)
item.dc:creator: Alien Firefox
item.content:encoded:
G'day

Im looking for a way to convert the rayne model from bloodrayne 2, most gamers would know bloodrayne 2 and i was hopeing that someone could teach me a way to convert this model into ut2004. or if possible skin it and put it onto one of the female models in ut2004. either way i dont care just aslong as it works. i dont know how to add screenshots or anything to this forum to show you what she looks like but shes on the net in alot of places. just look up some bloodrayne screenshots...

Bloodrayne model or skin request

Thx

item.title: Transformers?
item.author: invalid@example.com (DarkBlade)
item.dc:creator: DarkBlade
item.content:encoded:
Hi everybody I'm new here.


With that out of the way. I seen the Optimus Prime and Megatron Models and I love to play with them. I also Loved that Original TV show the old one that is But there are a few other Great Bots that would be nice additions to the list of models in this game I'm just gonna point them out and hope somebody That likes them might make them if Not Thats fine Megatron and Prime are still great by themselves.

SoundWave....

Transformers?

item.title: UT99: Hows this for a skin?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ant1991331)
item.dc:creator: ant1991331
item.content:encoded:
Lets just say... a while back I posted something regarding a .w3d, and this is it, and I doubt 99% that there is a .w3d converter. So, please, as a SkeletalMesh for UT99... yes yes, I know that UT99 modellers are rare nowadays, but please, thats all im asking. When I model it looks like a box with smaller boxes as arms and legs and dosent animate, pfffft...

Oh, and make it Gray, not Green...

Thank you.

item.title: Gears of war request
item.author: invalid@example.com (Argosax)
item.dc:creator: Argosax
item.content:encoded:
Hi, i´d like to request a model of Marcus Fenix ( the protagonist ) from the upcoming game gears of war. I think he´ll suit ut2k4 pretty well. If possible i want it with red and blue colours.
Thx
PS: i´ll post screenshots of him asap.

item.title: Male Anthromorphic Fox?
item.author: invalid@example.com (HyperFox)
item.dc:creator: HyperFox
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I love the site and just wanted to say great work on the Krystal model (I love it!).

Could someone please make a male (clothed) Fox model for UT2K4? It doesn't have to be a Fox McCloud lookalike, although that would be cool, but it would just be nice to have a male fox model to play. All the furs would bow to you for this.

Thanks for taking the time to read this, and thanks for the great models!

item.title: Request
item.author: invalid@example.com (»çrøssfïrê«)
item.dc:creator: »çrøssfïrê«
item.content:encoded:
http://www.alpha-net.ne.jp/users2/co2a/cg/co2a011.jpg


I was wondering if any one can make a skin or model (really don't know the difference) of this girl. Someone named Kimimaru said he would do it but he never did. I was even going to do it myself but I wasn't sure how it works to get a picture like that and make it into a skin. I'm really interested in skinning but all the tutorials are on how to make blood stains and clothes and all that but none of them I've found have what...

Request

simple request for brother
